Title: Albert Uderzo wamamaye mu bitabo bisetsa birimo icya ‘Astérix’ yitabye Imana
Body:
Umufaransa wamamaye mu kwandika ibitabo bisetsa ‘Albert Uderzo’ wanafatanyije na René Goscinny mu cyo bise ‘Astérix’, yapfiriye mu rugo iwe yishwe n’umutima.
Umufaransa wamamaye mu kwandika ibitabo bisetsa ‘Albert Uderzo’ wanafatanyije na René Goscinny mu cyo bise ‘Astérix’, yapfiriye mu rugo iwe yishwe n’umutima.
Umuryango wa Uderzo wari ufite imyaka 92 ni wo watangaje urupfu rwe. Yamamaye cyane muri ‘Astérix’ yakoze mu 1959 afatanyije na René Goscinny. Yitabye Imana kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 24 Werurwe 2020.
Bernard de Choisy, umukwe we yabwiye AFP ati “Yapfiriye mu rugo muri Neuilly mu Burengerazuba bw’u Bufaransa, yishwe n’umutima ntabwo ari Coronavirus. Yari amaze ibyumweru byinshi agaragaza umunaniro.”
Uyu mugabo yakunzwe mu buryo bukomeye mu muco w’Abafaransa, ndetse yagurishije miliyoni 370 za album z’ibitabo, filime 11 ndetse na ‘Astérix’ yatumye yamamara yubakirwa na pariki yo kwidagaduriramo mu Bufaransa n’ibindi.
Umunyarwenya Chris Addison yanditse kuri Twitter agaragaza ko Uderzo ari umwe mu bamushimishije cyane. Ati “Ibikorwa by’abantu bake nibyo bishobora kuzampa ibyishimo nk’ibyo yampaye kuva ndi muto cyane […]”
Mark Millar, umwanditsi w’ibitabo bisetsa birimo Kingsman yise Uderzo uw’ikirenga.
Oliver Kamm umwana wa Anthea Bell washyize ibitabo bya Astérix mu rurimi rw’Icyongereza yavuze ko Uderzo yari umunyabwenge noneho yabuhuza na René Goscinny bikaba byiza kurushaho.
Ati "N’ubwo atari azi Icyongereza nka René Goscinny, yishimiye uburyo umubyeyi wanjye yashyize ibitabo bya Astérix mu Cyongereza.”
Uderzo yahuye na Goscinny mu 1951 batangira guhanga abagombaga kugaragara muri Asterix barimo Oumpah-Pah. Mu 1959 basabwe guhanga ikinyamakuru cyiswe Pilote.
Goscinny yapfuye mu 1977. Uderzo yakomeje Astérix wenyine. Album ya Astérix ya 25 yagiye hanze mu 1980 ni nayo yari igiye hanze ikozwe na Uderzo wenyine. Mu 2009 uyu mugabo yagiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru agurisha uburenganzira kuri Hachette Livre.

Title: Trackslayer mu ba mbere baciwe amande yo kutaguma mu rugo hirindwa Coronavirus
Body:
Nshuti Peter wamenyekanye nka Trackslayer mu gukora indirimbo z’abahanzi mu Rwanda ari mu ba mbere baciwe amande kubera kutubahiriza gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo hirindwa Coronavirus.
Nshuti Peter wamenyekanye nka Trackslayer mu gukora indirimbo z’abahanzi mu Rwanda ari mu ba mbere baciwe amande kubera kutubahiriza gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo hirindwa Coronavirus.
Trackslayer yaciwe 50 000 Frw ndetse n’imodoka ye iba ifatiriwe mu gihe atarishyura.
Aya mande yayaciwe mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe 2020 ubwo yari mu modoka avuye mu rugo yerekeza kuri studio aho akorera i Nyamirambo.
Uyu musore ubwo yari ageze i Gikondo yafashwe na Polisi y’u Rwanda, yandikirwa amande y’ibihumbi 50 by’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Trackslayer aganira na IGIHE yagize ati “Nibyo rwose nari nishe amategeko, nta kundi.”
Trackslayer yavuze ko agiye kwishyura amande yaciwe, imodoka akaziyafata icyorezo cya coronavirus kigabanyutse. Yiyemeje kuguma mu rugo kugeza igihe hatangiwe andi mabwiriza.
Polisi y’u Rwanda yaburiye abaturage ko abatubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho agamije kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, bashobora kwisanga bahawe ibihano bishobora no kugeza ku gufungwa.
Trackslayer ni umwe mu bakora indirimbo mu buryo bw’amajwi bakomeye mu Rwanda ukorera muri Touch Record akaba yarakoze indirimbo zinyuranye zakunzwe ziganjemo izo mu njyana ya Hip Hop.

Title: Ishavu ku mutima… Ikiganiro na Cyusa ku buzima bwe n’umubano afitanye na Stromae
Body:
Cyusa Ibrahim ni umuhanzi uzwi mu muziki gakondo, akaba mwene Rutare Pierre wamamaye cyane mu Rwanda mu myaka ya mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatusti mu 1994, akaba umuvandimwe wa Paul Van Haver[Stromae] igihangange mu muziki ku Isi yose.
Cyusa Ibrahim ni umuhanzi uzwi mu muziki gakondo, akaba mwene Rutare Pierre wamamaye cyane mu Rwanda mu myaka ya mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatusti mu 1994, akaba umuvandimwe wa Paul Van Haver[Stromae] igihangange mu muziki ku Isi yose.
Uyu musore uri gusatira imyaka 31 amaze kwamamara mu bihangano bitandukanye bigaruka ku muco nyarwanda.
Umudiho uva mu itako, uyu musore avuka kuri Rutare Pierre inzobere bwubatsi ufite ibigwi i Kigali, wanagize uruhare rukomeye mu iyubakwa rya zimwe mu nyubako z’i Kigali mu gihe cye harimo n’imisusire y’amasangano yo mu mujyi rwagati (Rond Point) . Yanamamaye mu mukino wa Basketball na Volleyball.
Cyusa ni umuvandimwe wa Stromae nawe uri mu bahanzi bakomeye ku Isi wamamaye mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo ‘Papaoutai’, ‘Alors on danse’, ‘Formidable’, ‘Racine carrée’ n’izindi.
Cyusa na we arakataje mu muziki. Mu gihe kirengaho gato umwaka amaze atangiye gushyira hanze ibihangano, ni umwe mu barangamiwe mu gisekuru cye kubera gutera umugongo injyana z’amahanga akimakaza gakondo.
Amaze gukora indirimbo zirimo ‘Umutako’, ‘Mbwire nde’, ‘Rwanda Nkunda Migabo’, ‘Umwitero’ ndetse n’iza kera yasubiyemo nka ‘Imparamba’ na ‘Muhoza wanjye’.
IGIHE yamwegereye imuganiriza byinshi ku buzima bwe mu muziki no hanze yawo.
IGIHE: Uherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo wasubiyemo yitwa ‘Imparamba’ wabitekereje ute ?
Cyusa: Iriya ndirimbo ni iya kera, iri mu zo bita ‘Intwatwa’ nk’uko wumva ‘Benimana’ cyangwa ‘Bagore beza’. Nabonye abantu batangiye kuyibagirwa ubu nashakaga kubumvisha ibitero byayo by’umwimerere ngo bongere bayikunde nk’uko bayikundaga. Iri mu zo nkunda cyane kandi irabyinitse.
IGIHE: Kuki watekereje umuziki gakondo kandi abasore nkawe benshi batabikunda ?
Cyusa: Ntabwo ari njye wayihisemo niyo yampisemo kuko ni ibintu natangiye mfite imyaka itanu, mbyina mu bukwe baduhemba ibihumbi bitanu ku kwezi bakatuguriramo amakayi. Narabikundaga cyane. Kuririmba kuri njye ni ubuzima.
IGIHE: Watangiye ubyina, kuririmba byo byaje gute ?
Cyusa: N’ubwo nabyinaga naririmbaga ku ruhande, naririmbaga ku biri kumbaho, nanahimbiraga ababyeyi banjye. Mfite indirimbo nahimbiye mama wanjye, nyogokuru, umukobwa twakundanye n’abandi. Mbere narabyinaga nza kujya mu Itorero Inyamibwa, mu 2009 ndivamo mu 2010 mpita njya mu Nganzo Ngari nyivamo mu 2015 ntangira gukora ibyanjye.
Nabyinaga mu Inganzo Ngari nkora muri Banki, byose mbivamo ndavuga nti ngiye gukora umuziki gakondo uzantunga. Nabonaga ndi gucyeza abami babiri.
Hari amahoteli menshi yashakaga ko nzajya njya kuririmbayo mpitamo kureka akandi kazi aba aribyo nkurikira.
IGIHE: Uteganya kumurika Album ryari ?
Cyusa: Nateganyaga kuyimurika mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka ariko nibigera ntaragera ku byo nifuza nzabisubika.
IGIHE: Aho hantu ushaka kugera nihe ?
Cyusa: Ni igihe buri Munuyarwanda wese azaba azi izina Cyusa, ningera mu Ukuboza 2020 bimaze kuba gutyo nzayimurika.
IGIHE: Ni abahe bahanzi ufatiraho urugero ?
Cyusa : Uwa mbere ukinariho ni Cécile Kayirebwa. Uretse kuba ari umuhanzi ni n’umubyeyi wanjye cyane ko afite umwana twitiranwa, nanjye mba numva ndi umuhungu we. Kayirebwa yarabiharaniye, yakoze mu bihe bigoye. Yaritanze ku kuba umuziki gakondo ugeze aho ugeze.
Uwera Florida, Rugamba, Byumvuhore na Muyango nabo ndabakunda indirimbo zabo ziranyubaka.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu utiya kurusha ibindi ?
Cyusa: Ni inzara.
IGIHE: Ni iki cyatuma ubeshya ?
Cyusa: Mbonye hari ibintu biri bunkoreho nabeshya.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe kintu umuntu yakora ugahita umwanga ?
Cyusa: Ni uwanga u Rwanda. Umuntu watuma dusubira mu mateka twanyuzemo namurwanya kuko ntabwo yaba ashaka ko ngira umutekano.
IGIHE: Ninde muntu wabayeho, wumva wakurikiza ?
Cyusa: Rugamba. Ntabwo nagize amahirwe yo guhura nawe ariko iyo numvise ibikorwa bye, uko yitangiye abanyarwanda, akavugisha ukuri akakuzira. Kuba yaritandukanije n’ikibi akerekana ibyiza ndabimukundira
IGIHE: Ni ibihe bihe bibi wibuka wabayemo ?
Cyusa: Igihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Nari umwana ariko ndabyibuka tujya kurara mu bihuru, ndabyibuka duhunga…
IGIHE: Ibihe byiza wabayemo ?
Cyusa: Iyo ndi kumwe n’abakunda injyana gakondo. Abataramyi bose iyo ndi kumwe nabo ndanezerwa.
IGIHE: Kuba uvukana na Stromae kuri wowe bivuze iki ?
Cyusa: Bimpa ishyaka, bintera ishema kuba mfite umuvandimwe uririmba w’icyamamare.
IGIHE: Mujya muvugana ?
Cyusa: Turavugana, ni umwana mwiza gusa ntabwo akunda gushyira hanze ubuzima bwe buri hanze y’akazi. Ntabwo abikunda, niba yashyize hanze indirimbo murayikunda muyivugeho. Iyo muganiriye wumva ari umwana mwiza, ni imfura.
IGIHE: Azi Ikinyarwanda na gike?
Cyusa: Arakazi gake; ka kandi ngo bite? Muraho ? gusa nyine abaho nk’abazungu kuruta kuba ari umunyarwanda kuko yarerewe i Burayi.
IGIHE: Nk’iyo wasohoye indirimbo ukayimwoherereza akubwira iki ?
Cyusa : Arayireba akayikunda, akambwira ati komereza aho murumuna wanjye. Nkamushimira. Akambwira ati n’ubwo ntari kubyumva ariko akambwira ati ndabibona ko amashusho ari meza.
IGIHE: Mu ndirimbo wakoze zose hari iyo yakubwiye ko akunda kurusha izindi?
Cyusa: Ntabwo akunda kuvuga byinshi ntugire ngo turasahinda, ariko iyo mwoherereje yose arayishima.
IGIHE: Iyo wivuga ukunze kugaragaza ko ugira agahinda ko utabashije kumenya papa wawe….
Cyusa: Urumva Data Rutare Pierre yapfuye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, nari mafite imyaka ine gutyo urumva mu by’ukuri biba bigoye kuba nakwibuka isura ye. Yakundaga no kujya hanze cyane. Kuri Mama turi babiri, kuri Papa turi batandatu.
IGIHE: Umubyeyi wawe yari icyamamare, ni iki cyihariye bajya bamukubwiraho?
Cyusa: Yari umuhanga. Yubatse amazu menshi hari n’inzu yari mu rugando bambwiye ko yaguzwe miliyoni y’amadorali. Abantu bose iyo tuganira barambwira bati twizere ko uri umuhanga nka so.
IGIHE: Ni iki wigira ku mubyeyi wawe?
Cyusa: Yakundaga akazi. Hari byinshi njya nkora mama akambwira ati uri Rutare koko, ikindi yagiraga igitsure.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe ntego ufite mu muziki wawe?
Cyusa: Biragoye ariko nzabigeraho. Ndashaka ko nko mu myaka 20 cyangwa 30, umuntu yajya atekereza injyana gakondo mu mutwe we hakazamo izina Cyusa. Nimbigeraho nzaba ngeze ku idembe.
Reba ‘Imparamba’ indirimbo Cyusa aheruka gushyira hanze

Title: Umucuranzi Manu Dibango yitabye Imana azize Coronavirus
Body:
Umuhanzi w’umunyabigwi wo muri Cameroon Emmanuel N’Djoke Dibango uzwi mu muziki ku izina rya Manu Dibango, yitabye Imana nyuma y’iminsi mike atangaje ko arwaye Coronavirus.
Umuhanzi w’umunyabigwi wo muri Cameroon Emmanuel N’Djoke Dibango uzwi mu muziki ku izina rya Manu Dibango, yitabye Imana nyuma y’iminsi mike atangaje ko arwaye Coronavirus.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 86 y’amavuko akaba umuhanga mu kuvuza ‘saxophone’, umwanditsi w’indirimbo w’umuririmbyi, kuwa Gatatu tariki 18 Werurwe 2020 abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Facebook yari yatangaje ko yafashwe na Coronavirus.
Ati “Najyanwe mu bitaro nsanganwa indwara ya Covid-19. Ubu meze neza kandi ndi mu nzira yo gukira.”
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe 2020 nibwo hatangajwe inkuru y’urupfu rw’uyu musaza wari umuhanga mu muziki ndetse wanagize izina rikomeye cyane muri Afurika.
Manudi Dibango mu rugendo rwe rw’umuziki yashyize imbere injyana ya Jazz, Funk na gakondo yo muri Cameroon. Ise yari umwe mu bari bagize itsinda rya Yabassi ryakanyujijeho mu muziki.
Yavutse ku wa 12 Ukuboza 1933. Akora album zakunzwe zirimo; Afrijazzy, Nyxia, Tome II, Live ’91 n’izindi.
Yakoze indirimbo zakomeje izina rye nka ‘Soul Makossa’ yo mu 1972, ‘Big Blow’ yo mu 1976, ‘New Bell’ yasohotse mu 1972 n’izindi.

Title: Bruce Melodie yasohoye indirimbo yakoreye imbonankubone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga
Body:
Bruce Melodie yasohoye indirimbo “Henzapu” yakoreye mu maso y’abafana imbonankubone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga akoresha.
Bruce Melodie yasohoye indirimbo “Henzapu” yakoreye mu maso y’abafana imbonankubone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga akoresha.
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Werurwe 2020 Bruce Melodie yagiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga abwira abafana ko agiye gukora indirimbo, akayitangira bareba ikarinda ijya hanze babireba.
Ubwo uyu mushinga yari awugeze hagati nibwo hasohotse itangazo ry’uko guhera muri iryo joro nta muntu wemerewe gusohoka mu rugo iwe mu rwego rwo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iri tangazo ryakomye mu nkokora umushinga w’uyu muhanzi bituma asubika iby’iyi ndirimbo yari amaze gufatira amajwi avuga ko imirimo mike isigaye izarangira mu minsi mike cyane.
Bruce Melodie yinjiye muri studio nta gitekerezo cy’indirimbo cyangwa injyana aririmbamo yari afite. Uko yagiye atindamo niko yunguranaga inama n’abo bafatanyaga batangira gukora indirimbo gutyo.
Ni indirimbo yifuje gukora mu njyana ya Trap nubwo ari umuririmbyi wa R&B. Ubwo yari muri studio yasanze agomba kuririmba indirimbo ibabaje ahitamo kuririmba ku buzima bwe bw’ahahise ndetse n’ubw’uyu munsi.
Ubwo hakorwaga iyi ndirimbo byari biri gutambuka imbonankubone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’uyu muhanzi zirimo Instagram, Twitter ndetse na Youtube.
Bruce Melodie yabwiye IGIHE ko yagize iki gitekerezo kugira ngo yereke abakunzi be uko gukora indirimbo biba bimeze.
Nyuma y’amasaha arenga abiri nibwo uyu muhanzi yari amaze gufata amajwi y’iyi ndirimbo ariko ataratunganywa.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya ya Bruce Melodie yatangiye gukorwa muri studio na Element Pro ukorera muri Country Record, irangizwa na na Bob Pro.
